params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.label_detection_mode
params.description: What labels should be detected with LABEL_DETECTION, in addition to video-level labels or segment-level labels. If unspecified, defaults to SHOT_MODE.

params.name: data.stationary_camera
params.description: Whether the video has been shot from a stationary (i.e. non-moving) camera. When set to true, might improve detection accuracy for moving objects. Should be used with SHOT_AND_FRAME_MODE enabled.

params.name: data.model
params.description: Model to use for label detection. Supported values: "builtin/stable" (the default if unset) and "builtin/latest".

params.name: data.frame_confidence_threshold
params.description: The confidence threshold we perform filtering on the labels from frame-level detection. If not set, it is set to 0.4 by default. The valid range for this threshold is [0.1, 0.9]. Any value set outside of this range will be clipped. Note: for best results please follow the default threshold. We will update the default threshold everytime when we release a new model.

params.name: data.video_confidence_threshold
params.description: The confidence threshold we perform filtering on the labels from video-level and shot-level detections. If not set, it is set to 0.3 by default. The valid range for this threshold is [0.1, 0.9]. Any value set outside of this range will be clipped. Note: for best results please follow the default threshold. We will update the default threshold everytime when we release a new model.

methods.name: getLabelDetectionMode
methods.description:
What labels should be detected with LABEL_DETECTION, in addition to video-level labels or segment-level labels.

If unspecified, defaults to SHOT_MODE.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.videointelligence.v1.LabelDetectionMode label_detection_mode = 1;

If unspecified, defaults to SHOT_MODE.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.videointelligence.v1.LabelDetectionMode label_detection_mode = 1;

When set to true, might improve detection accuracy for moving objects. Should be used with SHOT_AND_FRAME_MODE enabled.

methods.name: getFrameConfidenceThreshold
methods.description:
The confidence threshold we perform filtering on the labels from frame-level detection. If not set, it is set to 0.4 by default. The valid range for this threshold is [0.1, 0.9]. Any value set outside of this range will be clipped.

Note: for best results please follow the default threshold. We will update the default threshold everytime when we release a new model.

Generated from protobuf field float frame_confidence_threshold = 4;
